name: GlucoseTimeInRange
title: Glucose Time in Range
description: The amount of time the person spent in their target blood glucose range, as identified by continuous gluose monitoring. (Business ID: Entry 37100)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Glucose Time in Range.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an the amount of time the person spent in their target blood glucose range, as identified by continuous gluose monitoring..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Glucose Time in Range.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Glucose Time in Range.)

contains.display: Glucose measurements in range out of Total glucose measurements during reporting period
